price: Dan mereka menyembah selain Allah, sesuatu yang tidak dapat memberikan rezeki kepada mereka sedikit pun dari langit dan bumi dan tidak berkuasa (sedikit jua pun).
arabic: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَمۡلِكُ لَهُمۡ رِزۡقٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayaʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yamliku lahum riz'qan mina al-samāwāti wal-arḍi shayan walā yastaṭīʿūna
